entry.source: Demons known as {F804,5}{F873,1}{F804,0} and {F804,5}{F873,2}{F804,0}{F801}have begun to appear. These may be demons, but{F801}they seem more experienced at fighting than{F801}even us Samurai. We need to take action.{F801}The demons have been seen on the third floor{F801}of Naraku. Only the brave reach true glory!{F801}
